thread.title: Kristen Cunningham

author: Kristen Cunningham
title: Kristen Cunningham
text: I purchased a hoselink hose reel for my husband for his birthday. The kids and I used to get a good laugh out of watching him struggle with the old reel always bursting off and him chasing it around the yard (from a safe distance inside of course). Now he has the hoselink reel he never has to worry about this - the only problem now is that we need to find some other knee slapping entertainment!
